insights.recommendation: To increase recurring revenue streams and drive subscription-based sales for a more stable income, Max Candle Co. should start offering subscription packages for their candles and aromatherapy products to incentivize customers to sign up for regular deliveries. They should also implement a loyalty program to reward repeat customers and encourage retention. The business should do more targeted marketing campaigns to promote their subscription offerings and communicate the benefits of monthly deliveries. To improve performance, Max Candle Co. could consider diversifying their product range or introducing exclusive products for subscribers to increase the perceived value of the subscription service.

Based on the quantitative forecasting method provided, it is recommended that the business gather accurate financial data and focus on the customers that generate 60% or more of their revenue. By quantifying what these key customers will do in the next six months based on actual conversations with them, the business can make more informed decisions and adjust their strategies accordingly. Additionally, they should continue following their current strategy while also focusing on increasing engagement and sales with their top customers to drive revenue growth in the next six months.
